## Senior Executive Staffing Search Services
### Reference Number: cb-5657-9093704
### Solicitation Number: NS24-20230104

#### Background Information
The Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council (NSERC) and the Social Sciences and Humanities Research Council (SSHRC) are soliciting proposals from Service Providers to supply Bilingual Executive/Senior Executive Search Services on an as-needed basis.

#### Scope of Work
The Service Providers will be required to provide recruitment and below-board search services for senior managerial positions for NSERC and SSHRC. These services must be conducted in both official languages and comply with all relevant laws and regulations.

#### Eligibility Requirements
To be eligible, Service Providers must be able to demonstrate the following:

* Technological capabilities to support the search services
* A team with expert knowledge in the fields of public administration and human resources
* Ability to communicate effectively in both official languages

#### Amendment
This is the first amendment to the solicitation.

#### Tender Closing Date
All Submissions must be received by 2:00 PM (local time) on 2 June 2023.

#### Delivery and Period of Performance
The period of performance is estimated to begin on 30 June 2023 and end on 29 June 2024. This includes any possible extensions. Service Providers will be responsible for delivering their services from their head office and as needed from other locations.

#### Evaluation Criteria
Proposals will be evaluated based on both technical merit and price.

#### Language of the Service
Service Providers must be able to deliver services in both official languages.

#### Trade Agreements
This solicitation is open to Service Providers from Canada and to those registered under one of the following international agreements:

- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
